casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS AND ADMINISTRATIVE ACTIONS

September 5, 2006

[Cite as 09/05/2006 Case Announcements, 2006-Ohio-4528.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2006-1557. State ex rel. Ludt v. Sciortino.

In Mandamus. This cause originated in this court on the filing of a complaint for a writ of mandamus. *1476Upon consideration of relators’ motion for an expedited alternative writ and expedited briefing schedule,

It is ordered by the court that the motion is denied.

O’Donnell, J., dissents and would grant an alternative writ.
